title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Profile Details
description: Message Profile details for the Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Profile Tracking ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: A unique tracking id refers to every single message sent as part of a MessageExecution activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: MessageProfile ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: A unique id refers to every single message sent as part of a MessageExecution activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Experience channel
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Experience channel related to the ExperienceEvent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Content Variant
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: A message execution can have multiple variants e.g. Multilingual (translated variants for the same content) or A/B testing (different content to test what works better) but a message delivered to a recipient always contains one of them.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: isSendTimeOptimized
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: True if the message execution is send time optimized.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Secondary Dimension Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The secondary dimension name of the message profile.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Secondary Dimension Id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The secondary dimension id of the message profile.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: isTestExecution
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: True if the message is sent as Test Execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Address
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The technical address, for example, 'name@domain.com' as commonly defined in RFC2822 and subsequent standards.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Email Namespace
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Email namespace associated with the email address in the consent preferences in the Profile, e.g. email or Email

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: IP Address
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Outbound IP address of the customer used to deliver the message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Domain
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Domain of the recipient's email address.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Email Attachments
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: List of attachments in the email message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Push Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Push provider service, e.g. apns or fcm

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Live Activity Details
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Live activity context for mobile push notifications. It includes the live activity ID, live activity event and an optional channel id which is used incase of broadcasting a live activity across multiple devices.

xdm:event.title: Live Activity Event
xdm:event.description: The type of live activity event being triggered.

meta:enum.localStart: Local start event for live activity
meta:enum.pushToStart: Push to start or remote start event for live activity

xdm:channelID.title: Broadcast Channel ID
xdm:channelID.description: The broadcast channel identifier for the live activity.

xdm:liveActivityID.title: Live Activity ID
xdm:liveActivityID.description: The unique identifier for the live activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: SMS Provider
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: SMS provider , e.g. sinch or twilio

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: SMS messageType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: SMS provider, e.g. inbound, inboundReply or send

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: SMS inbound Message
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: SMS inbound reply, e.g. stop, start, subscribe, etc.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: SMS inbound Number
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: SMS inbound Number : Sender Id where the MO being received

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: ChannelType will contain like : SMS, MMS , RCS etc.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Profile Phone Number
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Phone Number from whihc we recevied the Inbound message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Original Timestamp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Timestamp from Provider

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: whatsApp Message Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: whatsApp Message Type, e.g. templateBased,response

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: whatsApp Inbound Message
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: whatsApp inbound reply, e.g. stop, start, subscribe, etc.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: whatsApp Inbound Number
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: whatsApp inbound Number : Sender Id where the MO being received

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: whatsApp ChannelType will contain like : Utility,Marketing,Promotional.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Profile Phone Number
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Phone Number from whihc we recevied the Inbound message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Original Timestamp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Timestamp from Meta / WhatsApp

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Emoji received as a reaction from WhatsApp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Emoji received as a reaction from WhatsApp

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Reaction on the mesage ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Reaction on the mesage ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Action from WhatsApp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Action from WhatsApp

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: User-selected title from WhatsApp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: User-selected title from WhatsApp

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Interactive type from WhatsApp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Interactive type from WhatsApp message — options include: list reply, button reply, and button.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Selected Description
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Description of the Selected WhatsApp interactive message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: ID of the selected option from WhatsApp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: ID of the selected option from WhatsApp
